seasons_status_overheat_description: Warm clothes in summer cause overheating.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_ice: By mid-winter the sea is covered with ice and boats become useless.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_torch: A torch can warm you in winter and can be a lifesaver during a snowstorm.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_harvests: Harvests ripen faster in spring and summer. Prepare for the harsh winter ahead.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_nights: Winter nights are longer, darker and colder.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_overheat: Summer brings heat: layers of warm clothing can cause overheating. One cold and sweet delicacy is a lifesaver.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_firewood: Firewood burns faster in autumn and winter, so stock up on extra firewood for the winter in advance.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_perish: In winter, nothing grows, and most plants die from the cold. A nearby heat source can provide protection from frost.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_traders: Merchants offer seasonal goods - visit them when the season changes to avoid missing out on great deals.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_stats: The time of year affects your stamina and skills: monitor your condition and adapt to the season.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_wolves: Winter hunger forces wolves to descend from the mountains in search of food. You can become hunted anywhere.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_swimming: Don't even think about swimming in winter - you'll freeze to death.
seasons_loadscreen_tip_clutter: In spring, meadows, forests and swamps blossom.
